PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_ProjectOrderChangeOrder
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: A change order is an instruction to make a change to a product or work being undertake. Note that the change order status is defined in the same way as a work order status since a change order implies a work requirement.

PropertyDef.Name: ChangeDescription
PropertyDef.Definition: A general description of the change.

PropertyDef.Name: ReasonForChange
PropertyDef.Definition: A description of the problem for why a change is needed.
